pages.text: Kalbarria is a Euthycarcinoid, an early arthropod that lived during the Ordovician period. Kalbarria was found in freshwater deposits, suggesting a freshwater lifestyle, and it probably came onto land to lay eggs like modern horseshoe crabs.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
